Uses of Class
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.algorithms.knn.similarities.GraphSimilarity

Packages that use GraphSimilarity 
Package Description
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.algorithms.knn.similarities
Package containing the definitions for similarities between users.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.algorithms.knn.similarities.foaf
Package containing the definitions for similarities between users, based on friends of friends link prediction approaches.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.algorithms.knn.similarities.ir
Package containing the definitions for similarities between users, based on information retrieval models.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.updateable.knn.sim  

  • Uses of GraphSimilarity in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.algorithms.knn.similarities

    Subclasses of GraphSimilarity in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.algorithms.knn.similarities 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  RecommenderSimilarity
    Class which applies any contact recommendation algorithm as a graph similarity for contact recommendation / link prediction.

  • Uses of GraphSimilarity in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.algorithms.knn.similarities.foaf

    Subclasses of GraphSimilarity in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.algorithms.knn.similarities.foaf 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AdamicSimilarity
    Similarity based on the Adamic-Adar link prediction approach.
    class  CosineSimilarity
    Similarity based on the Salton index (a.k.a.as cosine similarity).
    class  JaccardSimilarity
    Similarity based on the Jaccard similarity link prediction algorithm
    class  MostCommonNeighborsSimilarity
    Similarity based on the Most Common Neighbors link prediction algorithm.

  • Uses of GraphSimilarity in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.algorithms.knn.similarities.ir

    Subclasses of GraphSimilarity in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.algorithms.knn.similarities.ir 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  BIRSimilarity
    Similarity based on the BIR method from Information Retrieval.
    class  BM25Similarity
    Similarity based on the BM25 method from Information Retrieval.
    class  DFReeKLIMSimilarity
    Similarity based on the DFReeKLIM method on Information Retrieval.
    class  DFReeSimilarity
    Similarity based on the DFRee model for Information Retrieval
    class  DLHSimilarity
    Similarity based on the DLH model for Information Retrieval.
    class  DPHSimilarity
    Similarity based on the DPH model for Information Retrieval.
    class  ExtremeBM25Similarity
    Similarity based on the Extreme BM25 method from Information Retrieval.
    class  PL2Similarity
    Similarity based on the PL2 model from Information Retrieval
    class  QLDSimilarity
    Similarity based on the Query Likelihood IR model with Dirichlet smoothing.
    class  QLJMSimilarity
    Similarity based on the Query Likelihood IR model with Jelinek-Mercer smoothing.
    class  QLLSimilarity
    Similarity based on the Query Likelihood IR model with Laplace smoothing.
    class  TerrierIRSimilarity
    Class that uses the Terrier IR engine to generate similarities between elements.
    class  VSMSimilarity
    Similarity based on the vector space model from Information Retrieval.

  • Uses of GraphSimilarity in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.updateable.knn.sim

    Subclasses of GraphSimilarity in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.updateable.knn.sim 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  UpdateableGraphCosineSimilarity
    Updateable version of the cosine similarity.
    class  UpdateableGraphSimilarity
    Updateable similarity based on a social network graph.
